description:
Violet travels to a countryside mansion to write a letter for a gravely ill war widow, but her young daughter Ann resents Violet`s presence.
Source: netflix

titles.title: "Ai Suru Hito wa Zutto Mimamotte Iru"
A Loved One Will Always Watch Over You
Ukochani zawsze będą nad tobą czuwać
「愛する人は ずっと見守っている」
